title: When you die by fiora.
body:
And your death screen shows true dmg from 3 different sources. Ult,passive and conqueror. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

Edit: not trying to make this thread controversial. It was an urf game. I was full tank maokai with like 300 armor that made no difference.

OH GOD NO
Sorry, but is this anything new? She's had a true damage-heavy kit for a few years? I don't understand where your bewilderment comes from.
I think he is saying "like she needed more True damage?"

> [{quoted}](name=Tacosrock,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-06T20:54:21.122+0000)
>
> Sorry, but is this anything new? She's had a true damage-heavy kit for a few years? I don't understand where your bewilderment comes from.

It pisses me off when people add question marks to the end of sentences that aren't questions?
They're called rhetorical questions
No. They're called errors
rherrorical questions ?

It's a question you "ask" but don't expect an answer. Usually used to make anyone you ask the question into an idiot, for example:

> And what did you expect playing against Fiora?

It's kinda like sarcasm

> [{quoted}](name=Elohaven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=000000010002,timestamp=2018-07-07T03:49:09.844+0000)
>
> They're called rhetorical questions

Not sure you know what that means, buddy

> [{quoted}](name=Toxicate13,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-07-06T21:48:36.752+0000)
>
> It pisses me off when people add question marks to the end of sentences that aren't questions?

That's done to signal to the reader that the sentence should be read with the [rising intonation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intonation_%28linguistics%29) of a question, indicating a sense of puzzlement.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=000000010004,timestamp=2018-07-07T07:35:56.287+0000)
>
> That's done to signal to the reader that the sentence should be read with the [rising intonation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Intonation_%28linguistics%29) of a question, indicating a sense of puzzlement.

I know what question marks are. I also know that it's pointless to use one in that context.

> [{quoted}](name=Toxicate13,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=0000000100040000,timestamp=2018-07-10T04:34:15.411+0000)
>
> I know what question marks are. I also know that it's pointless to use one in that context.

You may know what question marks are, but it doesn't look like you know what they're being used for. Here, it indicates the desired _intonation_ of the text, not necessarily that the text forms a question. You can do something similar by ending a question with a period: "Did you even read what I posted." That sentence is phrased as a question, but the period indicates the intonation of a statement, suggesting that the sentence's author knows that their audience didn't read their post. It can be an effective literary mechanism if used sparingly.
what. I don't get it???
I know, its so annoying?

Oh, I guess you’ve never studied rhetoric once in your life, so I’ll tell you. It adds an additional sense of questioning to my previous point so that my confusion is apparent with this post.

P.S. thanks for feedback other peeps I was confused
It does?
nah, max health magic/physical damage definitely have a place and can still be mitigated by armor
They can be mitigated by armor, but not by health, so you're still just devaluing one stat instead of another.

Getting dealt 4.8K damage on {{champion:23}}'s Super Mega Death Rocket.
https://imgur.com/yGkSs4p
I love how one of the sources doesnt even have a name. Its just a box.

> [{quoted}](name=JamesTheMage15,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-07-07T01:15:04.286+0000)
>
> I love how one of the sources doesnt even have a name. Its just a box.

Better than getting damage death recap from passives that don't even deal damage Lol.
Or janna's silver bolts

{{summoner:14}} Passive, Ult, Cheap Shot, Infinity Edge.

Throw in a Lord Dominik's or Mortal Reminder and she's always dealing true damage unless you have 1k armor.
who takes conqueror on fiora
as I checked the top runes for fiora and all are conqueror. Yeah, I wonder.
Obv you could pick a champion that scales harder then Fiora or your jungler could camp and make her suffer.

> [{quoted}](name=Süddenly Résets,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2018-07-07T01:25:57.772+0000)
>
> Fiora is one of the hardest late game scalers. literally no one can 1v1 fiora late game unless she missplays pretty hard

{{champion:11}} {{champion:23}}
Does fiora not scale heavily into the late game?

Unless your abilities scale on tank stats, building full tank is an inferior URF strategy, as incoming DPS is greatly increased but your items will have the same defensive capability as they would in a normal match.
Mao is a special case as his passive scales on the number of abilities case, so you can health forever against 99% of the roster

> [{quoted}](name=AR URF,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-07-06T19:33:51.024+0000)
>
> And your death screen shows true dmg from 3 different sources. 

her ult is literally just activating all of her passive vitals on you.

so that would be 2 sources of true damage from her passive and conqueror. how can she possibly deal damage with her ult and her passive separately?

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=8B5LtZZZ,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-07-07T10:19:42.561+0000)
>
> her ult is literally just activating all of her passive vitals on you.
> 
> so that would be 2 sources of true damage from her passive and conqueror. how can she possibly deal damage with her ult and her passive separately?

well her passive comes up a lot when she lands her q or auto attack. So it's literally just constantly lifestealing off me, landing her passive and using her ult to finish me off.

Looks like she is bugged on URF - I see her oneshotting people with just 1 Q + first part of E, no weaving of autos or any external damage. Where does the rest of the damage come - only RIOT's coders know. No way this to happen in the normal mode. I don't understand why she, Karthus, Zed, Malza, Jax, Wukong, Fizz and Vlad are not disabled.
